sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import DashboardLayout from '../components/DashboardLayout'; import Chart from '../components/Chart'; const Results = () => { const { electionId } = useParams(); const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [election, setElection] = useState(null); const [results, setResults] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { // Simulate fetching election results setTimeout(() => { setElection({ _id: electionId, title: 'Presidential Election 2024', description: 'National presidential election for the year 2024. Results are updated in real-time as votes are cast.', status: 'active', startDate: '2024-01-01', endDate: '2024-12-31', registeredVoters: 150000, totalVotes: 120000 }); setResults([ { candidateId: '1', name: 'John Smith', party: 'Democratic Party', votes: 45000, percentage: 37.5 }, { candidateId: '2', name: 'Sarah Johnson', party: 'Republican Party', votes: 42000, percentage: 35.0 }, { candidateId: '3', name: 'Michael Chen', party: 'Independent', votes: 33000, percentage: 27.5 } ]); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }, [electionId]); if (loading) { return (
Loading results...
); } if (!election) { return (

Election Not Found

The election you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

 ); } // Chart data const chartData = { votes: results.map(r => r.votes), labels: results.map(r => r.name.split(' ')[0]), percentages: results.map(r => r.percentage) }; // Statistics const stats = [ { label: 'Total Votes Cast', value: election.totalVotes.toLocaleString(), icon: ( ) }, { label: 'Voter Turnout', value: `${Math.round((election.totalVotes / election.registeredVoters) * 100)}%`, icon: ( ) }, { label: 'Leading Candidate', value: results[0]?.name || 'N/A', icon: ( ) }, { label: 'Margin of Victory', value: `${(results[0]?.percentage - results[1]?.percentage).toFixed(1)}%`, icon: ( ) } ]; return ( {/* Election Header */}

{election.title}

{election.description}

{/* Live Updates Indicator */}
Live Updates
Verified Results
{/* Charts Section */}
{/* Detailed Results */}

Detailed Results

Complete breakdown of election results

{results.map((result, index) => ( ))}
Rank Candidate Party Votes Percentage Progress
{index + 1}
{result.name.charAt(0)}
{result.name}
 {result.party}
{result.votes.toLocaleString()}
{result.percentage.toFixed(1)}%
{/* Election Details */}

Election Information

Status: {election.status}
Start Date: {new Date(election.startDate).toLocaleDateString()}
End Date: {new Date(election.endDate).toLocaleDateString()}
Registered Voters: {election.registeredVoters.toLocaleString()}

Security Features

Fingerprint Authentication
Merkle Tree Verification
End-to-End Encryption
Real-time Updates
{/* Action Buttons */}
); }; export default Results;
